thread.title: LeBron James watches football on absolutely enormous TV screen
thread.title_full: LeBron James watches football on absolutely enormous TV screen

author: Larry Brown
title: LeBron James watches football on absolutely enormous TV screen
text:
LeBron James watches football on absolutely enormous TV screen October 1, 2015 0 0 
LeBron James loves to watch some NFL whenever he has the chance, and he does so on one of the most enormous home TVs we’ve ever seen. 
James shared the above photo on Instagram Thursday of his baby daughter up against the TV screen while the Cavaliers star was watching the Steelers-Ravens game. 
“Guess lil mama like football just like poppa!” James captioned the photo . 
We’re guessing she probably just likes the huge screen and all the colors more than the actual game, but no need to tell LeBron that. We’re also figuring that LeBron can break that screen into four different games when he wants to. 
So who do you think had the sweet setup first? LeBron or Dwyane Wade? Filed Under:
